component.name: abortMultipartUpload
component.description: Abort a currently active multipart upload

component.name: copyBucketObject
component.description: Creates a copy of an object that is already stored in Amazon S3

component.name: deleteObject
component.description: Removes the null version (if there is one) of an object and inserts a delete marker, which becomes the latest version of the object

component.name: deleteObjects
component.description: Delete multiple objects from a bucket using a single HTTP request

component.name: getObject
component.description: Retrieves objects from Amazon S3

component.name: getObjectACL
component.description: Returns the access control list (ACL) of an object

component.name: getObjectTagging
component.description: Retrieve the list of tags associated with the object

component.name: getObjectTorrent
component.description: Returns torrent files from a bucket

component.name: headObject
component.description: Retrieves metadata from an object without returning the object itself

component.name: completeMultipartUpload
component.description: Complete the multipart upload

component.name: createMultipartUpload
component.description: Create a multipart upload for Part uploads

component.name: listParts
component.description: Retrieve list of uploaded parts

component.name: multipartUpload
component.description: Complete a currently active multipart upload

component.name: putObject
component.description: Create objects from Amazon S3 bucket

component.name: putObjectAcl
component.description: Set the access control list (ACL) permissions for an object that already exists in a bucket

component.name: restoreObject
component.description: Restores a temporary copy of an archived object

component.name: uploadPart
component.description: Upload a tag for a current multipart upload

component.name: uploadPartCopy
component.description: Uploads a tag by copying data from an existing object as data source

component.name: generatePutObjectPresignedUrl
component.description: Generate a presigned URL to upload an object to Amazon S3

component.name: generateGetObjectPresignedUrl
component.description: Generate a presigned URL to download an object from Amazon S3
